General.Name: Safinus
General.Description: Saifus is a cryptocurrency and ICO investment platform that aims to make cryptocurrency investments accessible to a wide audience of newcomers, while at the same time allowing experienced investors and market professionals to greatly increase their earnings. The SAF Token is a utility ERC20 token that will be used to access the Safinus platform.

ICO.Description:
Saifus is a cryptocurrency and ICO investment platform that aims to make cryptocurrency investments accessible to a wide audience of newcomers, while at the same time allowing experienced investors and market professionals to greatly increase their earnings. The SAF Token is a utility ERC20 token that will be used to access the Safinus platform.

Team:

  • Alexey Scherbin: CEO, Co-Founder 
  • Ivan Morgunov: CFO, Co-Founder 
  • Dmitriy Morgun: CTO, Co-Founder 
  • Julia Luckman: CMO 

The Safinus ICO began on the 23rd of January and will end on the 14th of February. The ICO token allocation represents 92% of the total supply and will be available for a $1 base price. The pre-sale funding cap is set at $500,000

Token Reserve Split (8%):

  • 5% for PR
  • 3% for bounty

The Saifus ICO feautres bonuses and a bounty campaign
